post.body: No, not bad
Thanks!
I'm not even going to talk about Merlin yet...I've heard stuff...but until it's on my tv I'm in denial
Probably not, they have the full two seasons on On Demand...which means I can conceivably go back to the beginning
I may have to look for it then. But not now. Now I must brush my teeth and pack my lunch and go to work.
RE: Big Love- I watched it when it first came out, then ran away because I had too many fandoms already...then yesterday...
I do have a bit of a doppleganger kink...
what? Pink making out with herself? 1) how? 2) where?
Big Love is just...well written and well acted and maybe it isn't polyamory...but I love that it shows the love and hardship
I fight getting into new fandoms because of how much it eats my life..
I gave him kinky sex with Steve yesterday, he's all smiles.
I can't make Chris tell me anything when he smiles at me like that!
I haven't got a clue. Chris says Momma. *headdesk*
Also? I anticipated this fic to go to about 2000 words. More than half way there and not even a hint of sex.
But? I have my leverage fic on a thumb drive...in case it's a slow day.
HBO had a marathon on...and when I turned on the television to re-watch Leverage, it was on HBO...3 hours later....
...thus the feet dragging last night when I was on my 3rd ep of Big Love...gods but that show could eat my life
It's official. I am *IN* the Leverage fandom. I have joined communities and am writing fic.
I want to crawl back into bed
*bleery* Morning peoples
